description.overview: This class is designed for beginners to introduce the fundamental principles of Hatha Yoga.
description.learningOutcome: By the end of this class, students will have a basic understanding of Hatha Yoga poses and breathing techniques.

reviews.name: John Doe
reviews.comment: Great class for beginners! Highly recommended.

reviews.name: Jane Smith
reviews.comment: I really enjoyed the class. The instructor was knowledgeable and friendly.

description.overview: Experience a dynamic flow of yoga postures that synchronize with breath.
description.learningOutcome: Students will improve their flexibility, strength, and balance through regular Vinyasa practice.

reviews.name: Alice Cooper
reviews.comment: Amazing class! The flow was challenging but rewarding.

reviews.name: Michael Brown
reviews.comment: Vinyasa Flow is now my favorite style of yoga. The instructor was fantastic!

description.overview: This class focuses on holding poses for an extended period to improve flexibility and relaxation.
description.learningOutcome: Students will learn mindfulness techniques and experience deep relaxation through Yin Yoga and Meditation.

reviews.name: Emma Johnson
reviews.comment: I loved the Yin Yoga session. It helped me release tension and stress.

reviews.name: David Lee
reviews.comment: The instructor was excellent, guiding us through the practice with a soothing voice.

description.overview: A vigorous and challenging class focusing on building strength and stamina.
description.learningOutcome: Students will develop core strength and increase their overall physical endurance.

reviews.name: Daniel Brown
reviews.comment: Power Yoga was intense, but it left me feeling invigorated.

reviews.name: Sophia Parker
reviews.comment: The instructor was motivating and helped us push through the challenging poses.

description.overview: A calming and gentle yoga class perfect for stress relief and relaxation.
description.learningOutcome: Students will leave the class feeling rejuvenated and at ease.

reviews.name: Olivia White
reviews.comment: The Gentle Yoga class was exactly what I needed after a busy week.

reviews.name: Ethan Taylor
reviews.comment: The instructor created a peaceful atmosphere, making the class truly relaxing.

description.overview: A challenging class following a specific sequence of postures with focused breathing.
description.learningOutcome: Students will deepen their yoga practice and improve their overall flexibility.

reviews.name: Sophie Lee
reviews.comment: The Ashtanga Yoga class helped me advance my practice and build strength.

reviews.name: Jack Williams
reviews.comment: The instructor was knowledgeable and provided helpful adjustments during the class.

description.overview: A gentle and safe yoga class designed to support pregnant women through their journey.
description.learningOutcome: Expectant mothers will learn poses and breathing techniques to ease pregnancy discomforts.

reviews.name: Maria Lopez
reviews.comment: Prenatal Yoga was a wonderful experience, helping me connect with my body and baby.

reviews.name: Linda Carter
reviews.comment: The instructor was compassionate and understanding of the unique needs of pregnant women.

description.overview: Learn relaxation techniques and gentle yoga poses to reduce stress and anxiety.
description.learningOutcome: Students will acquire tools to manage stress and promote emotional well-being.

reviews.name: Alex Turner
reviews.comment: The Yoga for Stress Relief class was therapeutic, helping me unwind and clear my mind.

reviews.name: Kate Morgan
reviews.comment: The instructor's guidance during meditation was soothing and calming.
